title: Riot how about duskblade auto disable traps passive?
body: Will it still be a thing or will it only reveals traps?

replies.body: Intention is that Duskblade will work the same as Control Wards and red trinkets (reveals and disables vision from hidden traps, doesn't disable other effects).
to be clear, will these proc the fear from shaco box on being revealed?

> [{quoted}](name=Meddler,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=3Uj0yqEG,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2017-02-08T21:47:59.562+0000)
>
> Intention is that Duskblade will work the same as Control Wards and red trinkets (reveals and disables vision from hidden traps, doesn't disable other effects).

Meddler what is gonna happen to rageblade?. Item sure is looking like hot garbage or at least. very weak to buy outside of kayle. its just too expensive and its not nearly as core of an item as triforce or IE. yet it costs the same i cri

it should be a 2800-3000 item not 3.6k gold.

ofcourse reduce the stats 

I mean the build path is god awful too.
Probably. It's quite expensive so it's not an easy buy just to counter traps.
